CustomField.formula:
(IF(ISBLANK( Customer_Problem_1__c ), 0, 1) + IF(ISBLANK( Problem_Evidence_1__c ), 0,1) + IF(ISBLANK( Problem_Impact_1__c ), 0, 1) + IF(ISBLANK( Quantifiable_Benefit_1__c ), 0, 1) +
IF(ISBLANK( Customer_Problem_2__c ), 0,1) + IF(ISBLANK( Problem_Evidence_2__c ), 0,1) + IF(ISBLANK( Problem_Impact_2__c ), 0, 1) + IF(ISBLANK( Quantifiable_Benefit_2__c ), 0, 1) +
IF(ISBLANK( Customer_Problem_3__c ), 0,1) + IF(ISBLANK( Problem_Evidence_3__c ), 0,1) + IF(ISBLANK( Problem_Impact_3__c ), 0, 1) + IF(ISBLANK( Quantifiable_Benefit_3__c ), 0, 1) +
IF(ISBLANK( Context__c ), 0, 1) + IF(ISBLANK( Constraints__c ), 0, 1))
CustomField.label: Issues Completed
